name: Titans
description:
** Awarded ‘BEST NEW APPS’ in over 100 countries! **

BECOME THE WORLD’S MOST POWERFUL ALCHEMIST
Titans is a fantasy card battle game where YOU can become the world’s most powerful alchemist with an army of Titans! Craft your own legion of warriors from over 100 different materials and save your kingdom.

FEATURES
CRAFT over 120 visually-stunning titans and build your own custom army
Fuse Titans together to craft Legendary FUSION TITANS
Advance through various map areas to collect rare MATERIALS
Climb the ranks and cut down your enemies in our REAL TIME PVP ARENA
Strategically deploy TACTICS CARDS to change the flow of battle
Plan Titan FORMATIONS carefully to give you the edge in battle
Participate in DAILY EVENTS to give you rare rewards every day

READY FOR BATTLE?
Download Titans NOW to begin your journey, Master Alchemist


*Note: iPhone 4 and iPhone 4S is not officially supported
